content.question: A. Explain the role of the male migrant population in the location shown in the graph. B. Describe a demographic push factor that would motivate a male migrant from a rural area to move to an urban area in a very distant location. C. Explain the probable long-term pattern of migration away from the location shown in the population pyramid. D. Explain the degree to which the demographic pattern shown in the pyramid may result in the relocation diffusion of cultural ideas and practices.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
